backend/main.mo: Motoko canister managing user profiles with access control, allowing users to view and save their own profile and admins to view others'. Uses Map storage and authorization mixin.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report linking a deployment-related feature to affected frontend files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Pre-written summaries of numerous frontend files describing their roles in the React Design B UI and supporting utilities.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles defining light/dark theme CSS variables using OKLCH values and applying global background/foreground styling.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point providing root div and loading the main React entry script.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app wrapping routes with theme, Design B, Internet Identity, and React Query providers and defining all root routes.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialStore.ts: LocalStorage-backed demo credential system for creating accounts, verifying login, and retrieving stored demo users.
frontend/src/auth/demoCredentialTypes.ts: Type definitions for demo accounts and results returned by credential creation and verification functions.
frontend/src/auth/session.ts: Utility for persisting and validating local authentication sessions (OTP, password, guest) with expiration handling.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: Parses user input with regex-based command interpretation to return navigation, help, or fallback responses.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: UI panel for the voice assistant handling speech recognition, TTS, message display, and user input controls.
frontend/src/components/assistant/assist: Provides localStorage persistence for assistant transcripts with load, save, and clear helpers.
Defines TypeScript types for assistant messages, status, state, and command interpretation results.
frontend/src/components/assistant/Assist: Implements the assistant widget UI, handling transcript storage, command processing, navigation, and integration with the AssistantPanel.
frontend/src/components/assistant/useSpe: Custom hook wrapping browser speech recognition, exposing listening state, transcripts, and control functions.
Custom hook for speech synthesis, allowing text-to-speech, cancellation, and toggling enabled state.
frontend/src/designB/components/Dashboar: Renders a section header with title, optional caption, and optional action element.
Displays a styled dashboard tile with icon, label, optional value and caption, and supports interactive or static variants.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBS: Wrapper component applying themed surface styles for default, elevated, or outlined variants.
frontend/src/designB/components/DesignBT: Provides styled typography components including page titles, section titles, captions, and body text.
frontend/src/designB/components/ThemeSwi: Theme toggle component switching between the default and Design B themes using a switch UI.
frontend/src/designB/data/placeholders.t: Defines a UserProfile interface and exports a seeded mock user generated via flaker.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBAppSh: Defines the main app shell layout with header, content outlet, bottom tabs, assistant widget, and conditional user display based on authentication state.
frontend/src/designB/layout/DesignBBotto: Renders the fixed bottom navigation bar with Home and Profile tabs, highlighting the active route.
frontend/src/designB/storage/themePrefer: Provides functions to save and load the selected design theme from localStorage with fallback handling.
frontend/src/designB/theme.ts: Defines the Design B theme configuration and functions to apply or remove the theme via DOM attribute changes.
frontend/src/designB/themeContext.tsx: Implements a React context for managing and persisting the active design theme with a provider and hook.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the user's Internet Identity, invalidating queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useAuthSession.ts: Provides helpers to manage local session types (OTP, password, guest) and session validity checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useDemoOtp.ts: Implements an OTP demo flow with generation, verification, expiration handling, and resend cooldown logic.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides a full Internet Identity authentication context, managing identity loading, login, logout, and state tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Contains example backend query hooks, including fetching the caller's user profile via the actor.
frontend/src/hooks/useRedirectIfAuthenti: Redirects authenticated users away from public routes to /home based on Internet Identity or local session.
frontend/src/hooks/useRequireAuth.ts: Guards protected routes by redirecting unauthenticated users to /signin using identity and session checks.
frontend/src/hooks/useUserDisplayName.ts: Resolves a display name for the current user using profile data, local session info, or Internet Identity as fallback.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind imports and extensive CSS variables for light, dark, and designB themes.
frontend/src/lib/flaker.ts: Implements a seeded random generator and functions to create deterministic fake user profile data.
frontend/src/lib/utils.ts: Provides a utility function that merges Tailwind class names using clsx and twMerge.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the React app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loads global styles.
frontend/src/pages/AppointmentDetails.ts: Empty page placeholder for appointment details.
frontend/src/pages/DoctorList.tsx: Empty page placeholder for listing doctors.
frontend/src/pages/HomeDashboard.tsx: Renders the main health dashboard with metrics, quick actions, and protected access.
frontend/src/pages/Profile.tsx: Profile page allowing viewing, editing, validating, and saving user profile data with authentication.
frontend/src/pages/SignIn.tsx: Implements phone-based OTP and password sign‑in flows with Internet Identity integration.
frontend/src/pages/SignUp.tsx: Signup form handling name, phone, password validation, account creation, session setup, profile initialization, and navigation.
frontend/src/pages/Welcome.tsx: Landing page with hero content, feature preview, and navigation to sign-in or guest mode.
frontend/src/profile/profileLocalStore.t: Manages localStorage-based profile loading, saving, clearing, and initialization tied to session type.
frontend/src/profile/profileTypes.ts: Defines ProfileDetails structure with defaults and a helper to detect if any profile data exists.
frontend/src/profile/profileValidation.t: Validates profile fields including name, email, phone, and emergency contact, returning errors.
frontend/src/profile/useProfileDetails.t: React hook that loads and saves profile data via backend or localStorage depending on session type.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Utility for reading, storing, persisting, and clearing URL parameters from query strings or hashes.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind with custom colors, typography, container settings, plugins, and extended theme utilities including shadows, keyframes, and CSS variable–based colors.
project_state.json: Defines the project’s state, noting a failed deployment, a fix request, and metadata for managing deployment-related features.
